data.name: Attack of the Trafalas®
data.detailed_description:
Attack of the Trafalas is a fighting sim set in the digital multiverse where anything may happen. Fight your way to the top of the evil robot organization that you have created and turned against you, now you have to shut it down by becoming the best version of yourself, physically, mentally and electronically to combat the biggest evil organization the multiverse has ever seen which goal is to exterminate mankind in every reality.

AOTT is a beat 'em up video game series. The series features super martial artist "Player 1" as he fights against various adversaries and rivals from different realities in an arena like linear level system. The game features a digital currency system which you will be able to trade for in-game features, items, etc. for the official release.

data.short_description: A long time ago in a small island, an organization of evil robots have taken over, with the mission of corrupting and exterminating mankind, until a few decided to resist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB GPU

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 12.2.1
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:

if you are under 18 you acknowledge you have your parents permission.

Our games are protected under the copyright laws of the United States and other countries throughout the world. Country of first publication: United States of America. Any unauthorized exhibition, distribution, or copying of this film or any part thereof (including soundtrack) may result in civil liability and criminal prosecution.

The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings is intended or should be inferred.
